TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindablePropertyKey extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The secret key to a BindableProperty, used to implement a BindableProperty with restricted write access.

remarks.para: The following example shows the creation of a BindablePropertyKey. Write access is while read access is .
